content.query:
drop external table parquet

--for parquet files, set all columns as varchar and all columns headers should not have any space
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [parquet] (
	[Correlationid] nvarchar(4000),
	[Operationname] nvarchar(4000),
	[Status] nvarchar(4000),
	[Eventcategory] nvarchar(4000),
	[Level] nvarchar(4000),
	[Time] nvarchar(4000),
	[Subscription] nvarchar(4000),
	[Eventinitiatedby] nvarchar(4000),
	[Resourcetype] nvarchar(4000),
	[Resourcegroup] nvarchar(4000),
	[Resource] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = '/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [parquet_datalakedemodp203_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [parquet]
GO

SELECT [Operationname] , COUNT([Operationname]) as [Operation Count]
FROM [parquet]
GROUP BY [Operationname]
ORDER BY [Operation Count] desc
